trans-unit.source: User and group synchronisation with Active Directory

seg-source.mrk: User and group synchronisation with Active Directory

target.mrk: Nutzer- und Gruppensynchronisation mit Active Directory

trans-unit.source: The enterprise version of Signavio Workflow Accelerator offers user and group synchronisation with an Active Directory Server using the LDAP V3 protocol.

seg-source.mrk: The enterprise version of Signavio Workflow Accelerator offers user and group synchronisation with an Active Directory Server using the LDAP V3 protocol.

target.mrk: Die Enterprise-Version von Signavio Workflow Accelerator bietet die Nutzer- und Gruppensynchronisationen mit einem Active Directory Server unter der Verwendung des LDAP V3 Protokolls.

trans-unit.source: Before you can configure the synchronisation, check that you have the following pre-requisites.

seg-source.mrk: Before you can configure the synchronisation, check that you have the following pre-requisites.

target.mrk: Bevor Sie mit der Konfiguration für die Synchronisation beginnen, überprüfen Sie ob die folgende Vorbedingungen erfüllt sind.

trans-unit.source: Workflow Accelerator is installed.

seg-source.mrk: Workflow Accelerator is installed.

target.mrk: Workflow Accelerator ist installiert.

trans-unit.source: The first Workflow Accelerator user is registered, see <MadCap:xref href="../start/create-initial-user.htm#CreateInitialUser" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create the initial user </MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: The first Workflow Accelerator user is registered, see <MadCap:xref href="../start/create-initial-user.htm#CreateInitialUser" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create the initial user </MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Der erste Workflow Accelerator-Nutzer wurde registriert, vgl. <MadCap:xref href="../start/create-initial-user.htm#CreateInitialUser" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create the initial user </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: A domain account for querying the Active Directory - its username and password.

seg-source.mrk: A domain account for querying the Active Directory - its username and password.

target.mrk: Ein Domänenkonto um Anfragen an das Active Directory zu stellen - Nutzername und Passwort

trans-unit.source: Configuring the synchronisation consists of the following steps.

seg-source.mrk: Configuring the synchronisation consists of the following steps.

target.mrk: Die Konfiguration der Synchronisation umfasst die folgenden Schritte.

trans-unit.source: Create an Active Directory group that contains all Workflow Accelerator users as members.

seg-source.mrk: Create an Active Directory group that contains all Workflow Accelerator users as members.

target.mrk: Legen Sie eine Active Directory-Gruppe an, welche alle Workflow Accelerator-Nutzer als Mitglieder enthält.

trans-unit.source: Create an Active Directory group that contains all Workflow Accelerator administrators as members.

seg-source.mrk: Create an Active Directory group that contains all Workflow Accelerator administrators as members.

target.mrk: Legen Sie eine Active Directory-Gruppe an, die alleWorkflow Accelerator-Administratoren als Mitglieder enthält.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Create an Active Directory group that contains all groups as members.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Create an Active Directory group that contains all groups as members.

target.mrk: (Optional) Legen Sie eine Active Directory-Gruppe an, die alle Gruppen als Mitglieder enthält.

trans-unit.source: Log in to Workflow Accelerator with your initial user.

seg-source.mrk: Log in to Workflow Accelerator with your initial user.

target.mrk: Loggen Sie sich in Workflow Accelerator mit dem initialen Nutzer ein.

trans-unit.source: Open the Organization settings and select the LDAP tab.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Organization settings and select the LDAP tab.

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie die Organisationseinstellungen und wählen Sie den Tab LDAP aus.

trans-unit.source: Create a new Active Directory configuration.

seg-source.mrk: Create a new Active Directory configuration.

target.mrk: Erstellen Sie eine neue Active Directory-Konfiguration.

trans-unit.source: Validate your configuration.

seg-source.mrk: Validate your configuration.

target.mrk: Validieren Sie Ihre Konfiguration.

trans-unit.source: Synchronise the users and groups.

seg-source.mrk: Synchronise the users and groups.

target.mrk: Synchronisieren Sie die Nutzer und Gruppen.

trans-unit.source: Creating the Active Directory groups

seg-source.mrk: Creating the Active Directory groups

target.mrk: Active Directory-Gruppen erstellen

trans-unit.source: Active Directory users and groups that should be synchronised with Workflow Accelerator are managed within Active Directory by adding them to specific Active Directory groups. There are two groups for users, one which contains all Workflow Accelerator users and one which contains only administrators. All members of the administrator group must be members of the user group as well. Nested groups are not supported. All users and administrators need to be direct members of their groups.

seg-source.mrk: Active Directory users and groups that should be synchronised with Workflow Accelerator are managed within Active Directory by adding them to specific Active Directory groups.
There are two groups for users, one which contains all Workflow Accelerator users and one which contains only administrators.
All members of the administrator group must be members of the user group as well.
Nested groups are not supported.
All users and administrators need to be direct members of their groups.

target.mrk: Active Directory-Nutzer und Gruppen, die mit Workflow Accelerator synchronisiert werden sollen, werden innerhalb des Active Directory verwaltet, in dem sie zu speziellen Active Directory-Gruppen hinzugefügt werden.
Es gibt zwei Gruppen für Nutzer. Die erste Gruppe enthält alle Workflow Accelerator-Nutzer. Die zweite Gruppe enthält nur die Administratoren.
Alle Mitglieder der Administratorengruppe müssen auch Mitglieder der Nutzergruppe sein.
Geschachtelte Gruppen werden nicht unterstützt.
Alle Nutzer und Administratoren müssen direkte Mitglieder Ihrer Gruppen sein.

trans-unit.source: The synchronisation will copy the attributes <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">givenName</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">sn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">objectGUID</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">sAMAccountName</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">userPrincipalName</kbd> to the user in Workflow Accelerator. It is required that every user has the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd> attribute defined.

seg-source.mrk: The synchronisation will copy the attributes <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">givenName</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">sn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">objectGUID</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">sAMAccountName</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">userPrincipalName</kbd> to the user in Workflow Accelerator.
It is required that every user has the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd> attribute defined.

target.mrk: Die Synchronisation wird die Attribute <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">givenName</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">sn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">objectGUID</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">sAMAccountName</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">userPrincipalName</kbd> zum Nutzer in Workflow Accelerator kopieren.
Jeder Nutzer muss das Attribut <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd> definiert haben.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can define a third group that contains all Active Directory groups that should be synchronised. All members of this group should be Active Directory groups as well. Again nested groups are not supported. Users must be direct members of the synchronised groups. The synchronisation will copy the attributes <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">cn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dn</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">objectGUID</kbd> to the group in Workflow Accelerator. Every group member that is not a Workflow Accelerator user will be ignored.

seg-source.mrk: Optionally, you can define a third group that contains all Active Directory groups that should be synchronised.
All members of this group should be Active Directory groups as well.
Again nested groups are not supported.
Users must be direct members of the synchronised groups.

The synchronisation will copy the attributes <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">cn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dn</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">objectGUID</kbd> to the group in Workflow Accelerator.
Every group member that is not a Workflow Accelerator user will be ignored.

target.mrk: Optional können Sie eine dritte Gruppe definieren, welche alle Active Directory-Gruppen enthält, die synchronisiert werden sollen.
Alle Mitglieder dieser Gruppe sollten Active Directory-Gruppen sein.
Auch hier werden geschachtelte Gruppen nicht unterstützt.
Nutzer müssen direkte Mitglieder der synchronisierten Gruppen sein.

Die Synchronisation wird die Attribute <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">cn</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dn</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">objectGUID</kbd> zur Gruppe in Workflow Accelerator kopieren.
Jedes Gruppenmitglied, das kein Nutzer in Workflow Accelerator ist, wird ignoriert.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new configuration

seg-source.mrk: Creating a new configuration

target.mrk: Eine neue Konfiguration erstellen

trans-unit.source: In the LDAP configuration tab, select Create to start the configuration. Enter the configuration details on the configuration form.

seg-source.mrk: In the LDAP configuration tab, select Create to start the configuration.
Enter the configuration details on the configuration form.

target.mrk: Im Tab LDAP, wählen Sie Erstellen um mit der Konfiguration zu beginnen.
Fügen Sie dann die entsprechenden Konfigurationsdetails in das Formular ein.

trans-unit.source: URL - the location of your Active Directory server, e.g. ldap://adtest.local:389

seg-source.mrk: URL - the location of your Active Directory server, e.g. ldap://adtest.local:389

target.mrk: URL - die Adresse des Active Directory Servers, z.B. ldap://adtest.local:389

trans-unit.source: username and password - the login credentials of the domain account

seg-source.mrk: username and password - the login credentials of the domain account

target.mrk: Nutzername und Passwort - die Zugangsdaten des Domänenkontos

trans-unit.source: User group DN - the distinguished name (DN) of the Active Directory group which contains all users

seg-source.mrk: User group DN - the distinguished name (DN) of the Active Directory group which contains all users

target.mrk: DN der Nutzergruppe - der Distinguished Name (DN) der Active Directory-Gruppe, die alle Nutzer enthält

trans-unit.source: Admin group DN - the DN of the Active Directory group which contains all administrators

seg-source.mrk: Admin group DN - the DN of the Active Directory group which contains all administrators

target.mrk: DN der Administratorengruppe - der Distinguished Name (DN) der Active Directory-Gruppe, die alle Administratoren enthält

trans-unit.source: Group group DN - (optional) the DN of the Active Directory group which contains all groups

seg-source.mrk: Group group DN - (optional) the DN of the Active Directory group which contains all groups

target.mrk: DN der Gruppe der Gruppen - der Distinguished Name (DN) der Active Directory-Gruppe, die alle Gruppen enthält

trans-unit.source: License - the license that will be assigned to every synchronised user

seg-source.mrk: License - the license that will be assigned to every synchronised user

target.mrk: Lizenz - die Lizenz, die jedem synchronisierten Nutzer zugewiesen wird

trans-unit.source: The last field of the configuration form will show you if the configuration was already validated.

seg-source.mrk: The last field of the configuration form will show you if the configuration was already validated.

target.mrk: Das letzte Feld des Konfigurationsformulars zeigt Ihnen an, ob die Konfiguration bereits validiert wurde.

trans-unit.source: Validating a configuration

seg-source.mrk: Validating a configuration

target.mrk: Konfiguration validieren

trans-unit.source: Before synchronisation can start, the configuration must be validated. Validation includes the following checks.

seg-source.mrk: Before synchronisation can start, the configuration must be validated.
Validation includes the following checks.

target.mrk: Bevor die Synchronisation ausgeführt werden kann, muss die Konfiguration validiert werden.
Die Validierung umfasst die folgenden Kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Workflow Accelerator can connect to the Active Directory.

seg-source.mrk: Workflow Accelerator can connect to the Active Directory.

target.mrk: Workflow Accelerator kann sich mit dem Active Directory verbinden.

trans-unit.source: The configured groups are proper Active Directory groups.

seg-source.mrk: The configured groups are proper Active Directory groups.

target.mrk: Die konfigurierten Gruppen sind korrekte Active Directory-Gruppen

trans-unit.source: There is at least one user.

seg-source.mrk: There is at least one user.

target.mrk: Es gibt wenigstens einen Nutzer.

trans-unit.source: There is at least one administrator.

seg-source.mrk: There is at least one administrator.

target.mrk: Es wenigstens einen Administrator.

trans-unit.source: The users have the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd> attribute defined.

seg-source.mrk: The users have the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd> attribute defined.

target.mrk: Für die Nutzer ist das Attribute <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail</kbd> definiert.

trans-unit.source: There are sufficient licenses.

seg-source.mrk: There are sufficient licenses.

target.mrk: Es gibt genügend Lizenzen.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) There are groups defined.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) There are groups defined.

target.mrk: (Optional) Die Gruppen sind festgelegt.

trans-unit.source: Start the validation by selecting Validate . If the configuration is valid, the Synchronise button is enabled. If the configuration is not valid, the page shows a list with more detailed information. In that case fix the issues and run the validation again.

seg-source.mrk: Start the validation by selecting Validate .
If the configuration is valid, the Synchronise button is enabled.
If the configuration is not valid, the page shows a list with more detailed information.
In that case fix the issues and run the validation again.

target.mrk: Starten Sie die Validierung, indem Sie Validieren auswählen.
Sobald die Konfiguration gültig ist, wird die Schaltfläche Synchronisieren aktiviert.
Wenn die Konfiguration ungültig ist, zeigt Ihnen die Seite eine Liste mit detaillierten Informationen an.
In diesem Fall beheben Sie die Probleme und führen danach die Validierung erneut aus.

trans-unit.source: Every time you change the configuration, the validation must be executed again.

seg-source.mrk: Every time you change the configuration, the validation must be executed again.

target.mrk: Jede Änderung der Konfiguration erfordert, dass die Validierung erneut ausgeführt werden muss.

trans-unit.source: Note the validation might take several seconds depending on the number of users you want to synchronise and the perfomance of the Active Directory server.

seg-source.mrk: Note the validation might take several seconds depending on the number of users you want to synchronise and the perfomance of the Active Directory server.

target.mrk: Beachten Sie, die Validierung kann einige Sekunden in Anspruch nehmen, abhängig von der Anzahl der Nutzer, die Sie synchronisieren möchten und der Performance Ihres Active Directory Servers.

trans-unit.source: Synchronising users and groups

seg-source.mrk: Synchronising users and groups

target.mrk: Nutzer und Gruppen synchronisieren

trans-unit.source: If the configuration is valid, you can synchronise the users and groups. Start the synchronisation by clicking on Synchronise . If the synchronisation was successful, you will see a report of the added / updated users and groups. If the synchronisation failed, a list with more detailed information will be shown.

seg-source.mrk: If the configuration is valid, you can synchronise the users and groups.
Start the synchronisation by clicking on Synchronise .
If the synchronisation was successful, you will see a report of the added / updated users and groups.
If the synchronisation failed, a list with more detailed information will be shown.

target.mrk: Nutzer und Gruppen können synchronisiert werden, sobald die Konfiguration gültig ist.
Starten Sie die Synchronisation, in dem Sie auf Synchronisieren klicken.
Wenn die Synchronisation erfolgreich war, sehen Sie einen Bericht über die hinzugefügten/aktualisierten Nutzer und Gruppen.
Wenn die Synchronisation nicht erfolgreich war, sehen Sie eine Liste mit detaillierteren Informationen.

trans-unit.source: Note the synchronisation might take several seconds or minutes depending on the number of users you want to synchronise and the perfomance of the Active Directory.

seg-source.mrk: Note the synchronisation might take several seconds or minutes depending on the number of users you want to synchronise and the perfomance of the Active Directory.

target.mrk: Die Synchronisation kann einige Sekunden oder Minuten in Anspruch nehmen, abhängig von der Anzahl der Nutzer, die Sie synchronisieren möchten und der Performanz Ihres Active Directory Servers.
